snippet: Cleveland defensive end Desmond Bryant, who signed a five-year, $34 million contract in March, will miss the rest of the season because of an irregular heartbeat.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Cleveland Browns defensive end Desmond Bryant will miss rest of season due to an irregular heartbeat that will require surgery; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cleveland defensive end Desmond Bryant, who signed a five-year, $34 million contract in March, will miss the rest of the season because of an irregular heartbeat.

headline.main: Browns Defender to Have Heart Procedure
headline.print_headline: Browns Defender Set for Heart Procedure
